Let $I_{NN}$ of the flange = $I_{NN}^F = I_{NN}^F + A_{F} 	imes (G,Y)$ (A being the area of the flange)

= $I_{NN}^F = 122.6 + (1/3 \times 6) \times 9.25 = 122.6 + 94$ = $206.6$. 

Hence $I_{NN}$ of the web = $I_{NN}^W = I_{NN}^W + A_{W} \times (G,Y)$ (A is the area of the web)

= $I_{NN}^W = 206.6$. 


Hence the total $I_{NN}$ of the section = $206.6 + 545 = 7.51 	ext{ in}$.
